description.brazilian: Compre banheiros para o acampamento no bloqueio.
description.english: Buy bathrooms for the camp at the blockade.

description.brazilian: Compre banheiros para o acampamento no quartel.
description.english: Buy bathrooms for the camp at the barracks.

description.brazilian: Compre barracas para o acampamento do bloqueio.
description.english: Buy tents for the blockade camp.

description.brazilian: Compre barracas para o acampamento do quartel.
description.english: Buy tents for the barracks camp.

description.brazilian: Compre o nível 1 do bloqueio de rodovia.
Compre o nível 2 do bloqueio de rodovia.
Compre o nível 3 do bloqueio de rodovia.

description.english: Bring coffee to the police officers.

description.brazilian: Coloque o pneu para os patriotas cantarem.
description.english: Put on the tire for the patriots to sing.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o trio elétrico no acampamento do quartel.
description.english: Unlock the speech stage at the barracks camp.

description.brazilian: Faça o discurso 1 no trio elétrico.
description.english: Make speech 1 on the speech stage.

description.brazilian: Faça o discurso 2 no trio elétrico.
description.english: Make speech 2 on the speech stage

description.brazilian: Faça o discurso 3 no trio elétrico.
description.english: Make speech 3 on the speech stage

description.brazilian: Faça o discurso 4 no trio elétrico.
description.english: Make speech 4 on the speech stage

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o protesto na porta do quartel.
description.english: Unlock the protest at the barracks door.

description.brazilian: Caia da borda da terra plana.
description.english: Fall off the edge of the flat earth.

description.brazilian: Pule os muros e entre no quartel.
description.english: Jump over the walls and enter the barracks.

displayName.brazilian: O mar não está pra Patriota
displayName.english: The sea is not for Patriots

description.brazilian: Converse com Don Ramon Cortez Nicácio do Canto e Castro Neto.
description.english: Chat with Don Ramon Cortez Nicácio do Canto e Castro Neto.
Hang on the truck for 1 minute.
Hang on the truck for 3 minutes.

description.brazilian: Salve 1 cachorro de virar espetinho de comunista.
description.english: Save 1 dog from becoming a communist's skewer.

description.brazilian: Salve 5 cachorros de virar espetinho de comunista.
description.english: Save 5 puppies from being turned into a communist's kebab.

description.brazilian: Salve 10 cachorros de virar espetinho de comunista.
description.english: Save 10 puppies from becoming a communist's skewer.
Get kicked out of the barracks.

description.brazilian: Atropele 1 pessoa com a cadeira de rodas.
description.english: Run over 1 person with the wheelchair.

description.brazilian: Atropele 10 pessoas com a cadeira de rodas.
description.english: Run over 10 people with the wheelchair.

description.brazilian: Atropele 30 pessoas com a cadeira de rodas.
description.english: Run over 30 people with the wheelchair.
Spend 5 days fighting for the motherland.

description.brazilian: Resgate todos os cachorros e fale com Don Ramon Cortez Nicácio do Canto e Castro Neto.
description.english: Rescue all the puppies and talk to Don Ramon Cortez Nicácio do Canto e Castro Neto.

description.brazilian: Entre na frente de um carro.
description.english: Get in front of a car.

description.brazilian: Compre um refeitório para o acampamento do quartel.
description.english: Purchase a mess hall for the barracks camp.

description.brazilian: Compre um refeitório para o acampamento do bloqueio.
description.english: Purchase a mess hall for the blockade camp.

description.brazilian: Faça o gato de energia e fale com Hendrick Pastello.
description.english: Make a hotwire power supply and talk to Hendrick Pastello.

description.brazilian: Compre a enfermaria para o acampamento do quartel.
description.english: Buy the infirmary for the barracks camp.

description.brazilian: Encontre o Titanic no fundo do mar e fale com Léo DiCaprio.
description.english: Find the Titanic under the sea and talk to Leo DiCaprio.

description.brazilian: Corrija o código fonte da urna eletrônica.
description.english: Correct the source code of the voting machine.

description.brazilian: Tome a vacina de Covid e vire um jacaré.
description.english: Get the Covid vaccine and become an alligator.

description.brazilian: Ajude Carma Isabelli com a vaquinha para cobrir despesas jurídicas.
description.english: Help Carma Isabelli with the crowdfunding to cover legal expenses.

description.brazilian: Tente acertar qualquer coisa com a pistola.
description.english: Try to hit anything with the pistol.

displayName.brazilian: Conquista Salles em defesa do meio ambiente
displayName.english: Achievement Salles in defense of the environment

description.english: Spend 15 days fighting for the motherland.
Cry for help from the stars.

description.brazilian: Invoque os anunnaki para ajudar na luta.
description.english: Call on the Anunnaki to help in the fight.

description.brazilian: Encontre ao menos 1 pendrive com as provas da fraude.
description.english: Find at least 1 flash drive with evidence of the fraud.
